What is the subject of your message to {recipient}?

Send your message. You can send it in multiple messages if it's too long for one.

quick_commands.help:
Send command below for usage info:
SM,, - Send Mail
CM - Check Mail
PB,, - Post Bulletin
CB,, - Check Bulletins
quick_commands.send_mail_format:
Send Mail Quick Command format:
SM,,{short_name},,{subject},,{message}
quick_commands.post_bulletin_format:
Post Bulletin Quick Command format:
PB,,{board_name},,{subject},,{content}
quick_commands.check_bulletin_format:
Check Bulletins Quick Command format:
CB,,board_name
quick_commands.post_channel_format:
Post Channel Quick Command format:
CHP,,{channel_name},,{channel_url}
quick_commands.node_not_found: Node with short name '{name}' not found.
quick_commands.multiple_nodes: Multiple nodes with short name '{name}' found. Please be more specific.
quick_commands.bulletin_posted: Your bulletin '{subject}' has been posted to {board}.
quick_commands.channel_added: Channel '{name}' has been added to the directory.
quick_commands.invalid_input: Invalid input. Please enter a valid {type}.

common.help_prompt: Type 'HELP' for a list of commands.
common.error_node_info: Error: Unable to retrieve your node information.
common.okay: Okay, feel free to send another command.
